metadata.title: CVE-2024-2800 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ReDoS flaw in RefMatcher when matching branch names using wildcards inGitLab EE/CE affecting all versions from 11.3 prior to 17.0.6, 17.1 priorto 17.1.4, and 17.2 prior to 17.2.2 allows denial of service via Regexbacktracking.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
